Vice President of Business Development

About the Company

Industry

Type

About the Role

The Vice President of Business Development will be responsible for identifying ideal client targets, strategizing key pathways for substantial market expansion, and generating new streams of revenue.

Travel Percent
Less than 10%

Functions
• Business Development

Known Requirements
• Bachelor's or master's degree in chemistry, biology, or pharmaceutics required
• Proven experience in sales or business development required
• Expertise providing key metric and data-driven milestones required
• Excellent ability to translate customer service into sales success required
